vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new subdistrict for retail and personal service uses on property zoned Subarea 2 and Subarea 3 within Planned Development District No. 363, the Jeffries/Meyers Planned Development District, on the north and west corners of Merlin Street and Al Lipscomb Way
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to conditions
Z223-307(MP)
